pages.text: Tomihara saw the most chaotic time when Tomihara State fell down. $(br2)Tomihara at that time is definetly different to Tomihara now. The former was battlefield filled with blood and death, the latter is peaceful paradise for us, although peace is only a representation.

There used to be a swordman with his BambooLight, fighting with enemies to his death.$(br2)The BambooLight Blade was fully covered with blood which came from both its owners and its foes. So it is infused with Devils' Power.$(br2)Driven by Devils which were infused in it, the BambooLight unsheathed itself, then slashed all enemies' heads down.

These BambooLight is the so-called "Blood BambooLight".$(br2)Metal foil on its surface was fully covered with blood, and it even became part of the Blade.$(br2)It was infused by special Devils, which gave it more Devils' Power.
